Name: Stickman Trenches
About the game: Stickman Trenches is a challenging Real Time Strategy game in which you need to manage your men and weapons and build up your defenses in the brutal trenches of Stick World War 1. Balance focusing on attack and defense. Build up your army using numerous infantry types and powerful war machines like tanks, while also upgrading your trenchworks to better defend your men and protect your base. Remember soldier, if your base gets taken you lose. So charge across no-mans land and take the enemy's base first! Game Content Take the fight to the enemy in Single Battle Mode and learn to fight in the trenches, then try to survive against countless enemy waves in Endless Survival Use powerful abilities like calling in precision mortars or devastate the enemy with artillery bombardment Upgrade your trenches defensive abilities to better survive incoming wave attacks and give your soldiers better cover Equip your soldiers with WW1 era weaponry ranging from rifles, trench sweeping shotguns, snipers, flamethrowers, fully automatic machine guns and more
